title: (x) Condensed modern serif "Erich Von Stroheim" - Onyx {Geoff Riding}
content:
Nothing too exotic here, but I am still stumped.

Thanks in advance you fonts of knowledge.

| --- | --- |

 [‹ Hatteras Yachts logo square oblique sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202185619/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36568 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Text on Pokemon trading cards - Gill Sans {Rainer, Scott Leyes} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202185619/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36569 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ignatiusx

comments.content: That’s pretty dang close. Good work. Everything is a little thicker on the sign though. Perhaps they just made it bolder with a stroke. I consider this case closed unless someone has a better suspect.
